parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient Id whose Diagnostic report belongs to

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of the diagnostic report.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of the diagnostic report.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical Id of the resource.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical Id of the resource

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Id of the patient whose observation is about

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date from the date-range in which the observation was first recorded.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date from the date-range in which the observation was resulted or recorded.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code or component-code of the observation type.

parameters.name: initalIssueDate
parameters.description: First day from the date-range in which the update has done.

parameters.name: finalIssueDate
parameters.description: Last date from the date-range in which the update has done.
